Body: I have a Samsung Galaxy 10.1 tablet. I cleaned up some applications, deleting them via settings, and now I receive an error message when I open some applications. The message reads   The application Google Play Store (process.com.android.vending) has stopped unexpectedly. Please try again.This error keeps appearing, usually three or four times with option of forcing close or reporting error.Maybe I uninstalled some key file that I needed unknowingly. I cant find anything on updating this application or reinstalling factory setting only for this. Can anyone help?
Title: Google Playstore force-closes

history.Text: i have a samsung galaxy 10.1 tablet. i cleaned up some applications, deleting them via settings, and now receive an error message when i open some applications. the message reads "the application google play store (process.com.android.vending) has stopped unexpectedly. please try again" . this error keeps appearing, usually 3 or 4 times with option of forcing close or reporting error.maybe i uninstalled some key file needed unknowingly. i cant find anything on updating this application or reinstalling factory setting only for this. can anyone help? thanks

history.Comment: capitalization in title and body; formatted the error message
